articles.title: Indonesia hit back to reach Suzuki Cup semi-finals, Vietnam also through - CNA
articles.description:
Indonesia fought back after going a goal down to beat Malaysia 4-1 at the AFF Suzuki Cup 2020 in Singapore on Sunday (Dec 19) to progress to the semi-finals of the Southeast Asian championship alongside title-holders Vietnam.

Shin Tae-yong's side will take…
articles.content:
Malaysia went into their game against Indonesia needing to win to progress, and made the perfect start when Kogileswaran Raj's curling effort from distance beat Nadeo Argawinata in the 13th minute.
… [+1045 chars]

articles.title: Thailand beats Singapore 2-0 to remain unbeaten in Suzuki Cup - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: THAILAND handed Suzuki Cup hosts Singapore a 2-0 defeat on Saturday to maintain their unbeaten record in Group A of the Southeast Asian championship with both nations already through to next week’s semifinals.

articles.description: Defending champions India confirmed their place in the semifinal of Asian Champions Trophy 2021 will take on Japan in their final group stage match on Sunday.
